@Jerifishu you're right in a way but now here me out.

I know you're completely gonna offended by it but I'm gonna say this anyway:
• the masterpiece part! I just can swallow it.
• And by saying that's how real life immature people act you're on a off track my friend. Me as a 19+ year old who's by far can be the most suitable person to be in his category can tell that's not how we deal with real life circumstances.
• We watch anime because we want to some how run from real life problems because we find happiness and joy we can imagine stuff so don't came at me at us with shitty arguments.
• And don't discuss these stuff in this website not that I can complain lol.
